```vue
<template>
    <ui-container>
        <pre>{{ shadow }}</pre>
        <ui-complex-shadow v-model="shadow" v-bind="binds" />
    </ui-container>
</template>
<script>
import ui from './index.js';
import { ShadowTypeOptions, SizeUnits } from '@goodt-wcore/panels';

export default {
    components: { ...ui },
    data: () => ({
        shadow: {},
        binds: {
            units: SizeUnits,
            typeOptions: ShadowTypeOptions
        }
    })
};
</script>
```
